_header: This ender night half sleeping as I lay
Subjects: patronage, pleas for; James IV, king of Scotland; dreams
_description: William Dunbar, ‘The dreme’, a plea for money to King James IV — twenty-three 5-line stanzas

CULLl510.First Lines:
This hinder nycht halff sleiping as I layme thocht my chalmer in
                    ane new aray…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…On leith sandis me thocht scho brak in sounderAnd I anon did
                    walkin with þe crak
